channel.title: ZeniMax Buys id Software aka "Fallout 3 bought DOOM. Wow"
channel.description:
[url]https://g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/696815/ZeniMax-Media-Buys-id-Software-Bethesda-Teams-With-id-.html[/url]
Did anyone else get that cold chill down their spine when they read this, only to realize "Wait, that means more money to make DOOM 4 with!"
So yes, as long as id makes DOOM 4 the greatest game ever, then id can be bought by EA or Microsoft for all I care!
Besides, Bethesda is cool. Now they have id. Now Valve just needs to buy ZeniMax, and the world will be at peace!
Besides, now we won't have to give our money to Activision anymore.
So, what are your thoughts?

item.title: ZeniMax Buys id Software aka "Fallout 3 bought DOOM. Wow"
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
Someonerandm:

As long as Doom doesn’t become an RPG, we can be happy.

https://www.doomrpg.com/n.x/Doom%20RPG/Home

I know, but I still wanted to make this thread just to see what everyone else thinks.
